herro-section.title: Find the Best Driving Schools Near You
herro-section.description: Join now to unlock early access perks.

new-herro-section.title: Find the Best Driving Schools Near You
new-herro-section.description: Compare reviews, pricing, and pass rates in your area.

start-search.note: Select a location from the dropdown or type & press the Search button

how-it-works-section.subtitle: How it works
how-it-works-section.title: Your License Journey, Made Easy
how-it-works-section.description:
We take the hassle out of learning to drive in Sweden. Follow these three
steps to book lessons, track progress, and get test-ready with confidence.

list.title: Join the Waitlist
list.text: Sign up wi th your mobile number or email to secure your spot.

list.title: Verify Your Details
list.text: Check your inbox for a quick verification link to confirm your spot in line.

list.title: Get Your Beta Invite
list.text: We’ll invite you to our early access app with a discounted price and money-back guarantee. You only pay the school — we take no fees.

list.title: Search & Enroll
list.text: Find the right driving school, compare options, and enroll directly through our platform.

early-access-benefits-section.subtitle: Early Access Benefits
early-access-benefits-section.title: Why Join Now
early-access-benefits-section.description:
Get early access to premium features, priority booking,
and special discounts before our public launch.

list.title: Early Bird Pricing
list.text: Enjoy exclusive discounted rates on lesson packages during our beta phase.

list.title: Priority Booking Access
list.text: Get first pick of lesson and test slots before the public launch.

list.title: Shaping the Platform
list.text: Your feedback helps us build features that make your license journey easier.

list.title: Free Early Access Listing
list.text: Be featured on our platform at no cost during the beta phase.

list.title: Reach Motivated Learners
list.text: Connect with students actively preparing to book lessons and tests.

list.title: Influence Feature Development
list.text: Share feedback to shape tools that help manage your business.

smart-features-section.subtitle: Smart Features
smart-features-section.title: Smart Features to Simplify Your License Journey
smart-features-section.description: Everything you need to find, book, and pass — all in one place.

items.title: Compare Driving Schools
items.text: Instantly compare prices, locations, and pass rates to find your perfect match.

items.title: Secure Bookings
items.text: Reserve lessons and tests in just a  few clicks — safe, simple, and  hassle-free.

items.title: Access Anywhere
items.text: Manage lessons and progress  anytime on your phone, tablet,  or computer.

items.title: Progress Tracking
items.text: Watch your readiness score  improve after each lesson so you  know when to book your test.

items.title: Smart Reminders
items.text: Never miss a class, test, or deadline with automated alerts and  updates.

about-us-section.subtitle: About us
about-us-section.title: We know the struggle — we’ve lived it.
about-us-section.description: We’ve been through the stressful Swedish license process ourselves — the long waits, the scarce test slots, and the costly retakes. Körbil is the platform we wish we had, designed to make your journey to a driver’s license smoother, faster, and stress-free.
about-us-section.comment: We built Körbil to take the frustration out of  getting your license. Every feature is  designed to save you time, money, and give  you the confidence to pass.

list.title: What is Korbil?
list.text: Korbil is an AI-powered platform designed to modernize driving education by connecting students and driving schools through smart, user-friendly tools.

list.title: Who can use Korbil?
list.text: Korbil is built for both students who want to learn driving and schools looking to streamline their operations.

list.title: Can driving schools partner with Korbi
list.text: Absolutely. Driving schools can book a demo to see how Korbil can help them manage lessons, engage students, and grow their business. Reach out to us on <a href="mailto:skola{'@'}korbil.se"{'>'}skola{'@'}korbil.se</a{'>'}

list.title: What is Korbil?
list.text: Korbil is an AI-powered platform designed to modernize driving education by connecting students and driving schools through smart, user-friendly tools.

careers-list-page.title: Join Us in Driving the Future of Learning & Mobility
careers-list-page.description: At Körbil, we’re building a platform that connects driving schools and learners in smarter, more accessible ways. As a fast-growing startup, we’re looking for passionate people who want to shape the future of mobility and education.
